LanguageData.Miho_Mech_Bulgasal.label: Bulgasal
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_Bulgasal.description: A heavy multi-purpose tank suitable for combat. Depending on the situation it can switch between an armor piercing anti-tank gun or an anti-infantry gun.
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_BulgasalSiege.label: Bulgasal (siege type)
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_BulgasalSiege.description: A heavy multi-purpose tank equiped with a large plasma gun suitible for sieging.
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_BulgasalGrenade.label: Bulgasal (grenade type)
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_BulgasalGrenade.description: A heavy multi-purpose tank equiped with an anti-infantry grenade launcher. Not suited to take out heavily armored targets.
LanguageData.Miho_MechWeapon_Heavygun.label: Bulgasal Multi-Purpose Cannon
LanguageData.Miho_MechWeapon_Heavygun.description: A high-penetration cannon that uses 47mm rounds. It may look small, but it has a lot of firepower.
LanguageData.Miho_MechWeapon_PlasmaHowitzer.label: Bulgasal Plasma Howitzer
LanguageData.Miho_MechWeapon_PlasmaHowitzer.descripti: A siege weapon that uses 80mm plasma rounds. It takes a long time to cool down, but it packs a punch.
LanguageData.Miho_MechWeapon_Heavygrenade.label: Bulgasal Grenade Launcher
LanguageData.Miho_MechWeapon_Heavygrenade.description: A high-penetration cannon that uses 57mm grenades. Can be used against anything except heavily armored opponents.
LanguageData.Miho_MechWeapon_MachinegunTurret.label: Miho Coaxial Machine Gun
LanguageData.Miho_MechWeapon_MachinegunTurret.descrip: A coaxial machine gun for mechanoids that uses 7.7mm ammunition.
